name: Optics Lab
description: Explore classical mechanics through interactive simulations of forces, motion, and energy. Perfect for understanding Newton's laws and fundamental physics concepts.
author: Abhinav Prajapati

name: Microprocessor Lab
description: Dive into the fundamentals of logic design with hands-on experiments. Learn about digital circuits, Boolean algebra, and the principles of designing combinational and sequential logic systems.
author: Mansi Samant

name: Chemistry Lab
description: Perform interactive chemistry experiments, including titration and reaction simulations. Learn about chemical reactions and their properties.
author: Sachin Upadhyay

name: Electronics Lab
description: Learn the fundamentals of electronics through interactive experiments. Understand Ohm's law, electric circuits, and electrical measurements with hands-on simulations.
author: Sachin Upadhyay

name: Operating Systems Lab
description: Explore core operating system concepts through interactive simulations

name: Computer Networks Lab
description: Visualize and experiment with networking protocols and topologies
